attributes.action: overturn the decision of the Down Lisburn Trust to close St Johns Home in Downpatrick Co Down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is deplorable for  a Health Trust to close down such a wonderful facility for the elderly.Many have been resident of St John's for a life time.As a result of the closure announcement many are left wondering what lays ahead and where they are going to end up.
